sentences: Michel Barnier, Minister of the Environment, on behalf of the EU, said it is essential to complete negotiations by 1997 of a protocol to reduce GHG emissions beyond 2000.
He stressed the importance of the financial mechanism.
He said that France's national programme will be able to reduce GHG emissions to the 1990 level by 2000.
enb_long_title: First Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
